name: ZOMBIE EXPRESS - Train Escape
description:
Welcome to ZOMBIE EXPRESS - Train Escape! Humans try to outrun a pandemic of infected zombies. Everyone on the run! Survive until you are the final player remaining! Escape by train!

Escape from the infected zombies! Do not allow them to catch you, or you will turn into them. The onslaught begins, arm yourself and avoid the poison virus spreading. Find gear in abandoned locations including houses, train-station and bases. Will the zombies with anything you can get your hands on!
